model_answer: The reason for taking off the rain jacket is D: Because the temperature dropped sharply and he needed to put on a warmer coat.

The original content of this audio is:'During 00:06:09,526–00:06:31,548 (event 10), what purposes did the hikers’ stop at Brushy Mountain Outpost serve? Options: A: To eat a meal of burgers and fries as a late lunch/early dinner. B: To pick up M&Ms as snacks for camp. C: To check into a motel room for the night. D: To repair their trekking poles at a service counter.'
